posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content: Arelith is level 30, and there are many custom features and rules. One rule is that once you start with a new class, you have to take at least 3 consecutive levels of that class before you can switch to taking one of the other classes in the build. And your final build has to have at least 3 levels in any class you use, so no new class at level 29 or 30 and no single monk-cheese level at all.
